channel.title: Project Skibblez [APPLY NOW]
channel.description:
[center] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6c6GG.png[/img] [size=6pt]Image by [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=549400]KroniKz_[/url][/size] [hr][hr]
[size=18pt][b]Welcome to Project Skibblez[/b][/size]
[hr][hr]
Our server has no name as of the moment, [b]we are open for suggestions.[/b] It will be referred to as PS or Project Skibblez until so. In the event we do get a server name, the thread, and some parts will still be called Project Skibblez because it is a project, but the server overall will be called the new name.
[hr][hr]
[b][anchor=nav]Navigation[/anchor][/b] [iurl=#team]The Team[/iurl] [iurl=#med]Media[/iurl] [iurl=#con]Content[/iurl] [iurl=#app]Application[/iurl] [iurl=#upd]Updates[/iurl] [iurl=#faq]FAQ's[/iurl] [hr][hr]
[b][anchor=team]The Team:[/anchor][/b]
Currently, I'm the only member of team Skibblez. I have set up some forums for this server using SMF. I'll be working on getting approval for that shortly. I Sk8rdude461, am the leader, web designer, and project manager of this team. My job is to make the website, keep it healthy, work on the server, edit the server, add content, dispatch updates, etc. Yeah, I do a lot.
Webdesign/Developers: 1.Sk8rdude461
Server Programmers: 1. Sk8rdude461 2. (open)
Forum Moderators: None. This will be based off how many people join and are active on the forums.
Game Moderators: None. There will be no moderators added in-game until we get to at least the beta phase.
Note: Game/Forum staff will NOT be picked here, there will be no application for it. They will be hand picked by the staff and Administration on Project Skibblez.
[iurl=#nav]Back To Navigation[/iurl]
[hr][hr]
[anchor=med][b]Media:[/b][/anchor] Oh, look, character customization. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/boHi1.png[/img] Wait, the arrow works right? [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Gf1JZ.png[/img] -More to come-
[iurl=#nav]Back To Navigation[/iurl]
[hr][hr]
[anchor=con][b]Content[/b][/anchor] [i][b](Obviously not all of it)[/b][/i][b]:[/b] [Red = Unknown/Not started] [[shadow=black,right]Yellow[/shadow] = Started/Near Done] [Green = Near Perfect/Completed]
[shadow=black,right]Tutorial island[/shadow](30%) [shadow=black,right]All Members Areas blocked[/shadow] (40%) Melee (80%) Mage(80%) Range(80%) Quests(3%) Other Content (5-20%)
Blocking members areas is fast and simple, it allows us to focus on making the F2P features as best as possible. Once we get them up to optimal performance, we will work on P2P code.
[iurl=#nav]Back To Navigation[/iurl]
[hr][hr]
[anchor=app][b]Applications[/b][/anchor] (Thank you Team_Rocket for the new application): [code] Current Age[18+]: Design Perspicacity: Development Experiences: Experience in Video Game Design: Experience in Video Game Development: Programming Experience in Years: How many years have you been working with the Java Language: Past R.S.P.S. Projects/Public Servers: How many R.S.P.S. have you personally founded: Public Releases and Information: Do you have experience in Website Design and Development: Please list any and all Languages which you are knowledgeable of: Do you have a Certified Diploma or Degree in regards as to Programming: Level of Education (School/College): Personal Recommendations (people who will vouch for claims): How many Hours per Day can you be active and ready to work: How many Hours per Week will you be on: Are you currently an employee anywhere: How dependable are you: Can you be trusted if given access to a Dedicated, or trusted with vital information: [/code] NOTE: Fill it out AS BEST AS POSSIBLE. Questions? Ask me or post below.
[iurl=#nav]Back To Navigation[/iurl]
[hr][hr]
[anchor=upd][b]Updates[/b][/anchor]: [code] 1/08/13: Re-Wrote the Project topic. 1/07/13: Clawz Fury left the development team. Also added 2 pictures, and a new application 12/15-17/12: Wrote more dialogue for tutorial island. 12/15/12: Clawz Fury joins the development team. 12/12/12: Unofficial start of development. [/code]
[iurl=#nav]Back To Navigation[/iurl]
[hr][hr]
[anchor=faq][b]Frequently Asked Questions[/b][/anchor]: [/center] 1. You're making a P2P zone, does that mean players will have to pay to play? No, this server will always be free. Donations, however, will always be accepted; but they will not be pushed upon players. No player will receive some advantage because they did donate. Cosmetics might be handed out though. 2. Why are the P2P Zones being blocked? So we can concentrate on the free zones, giving you the best content we can, before focusing on the pay to play content. 3. You have an age requirement, why? It's there not because I despise young, immature, people. It's because most people 18 or over have a head on their shoulders, and know more, in general, then someone younger than 18, or 17. 4. You're not even 18 yet, why do you have a limit set higher than your age? Well, because I'm close to being 18, so the limit is rather realistic. 5. Is this going to end up like all the other F2P 06 remakes? No, this server is being made for fun and entertainment, not to profit, or bring content back for nostalgia. [center] [iurl=#nav]Back To Navigation[/iurl]

item.title: Project Skibblez [APPLY NOW]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[center]

[size=6pt]Image by KroniKz_[/size]
[hr][hr]

[size=18pt]Welcome to Project Skibblez[/size]

[hr][hr]

Our server has no name as of the moment, we are open for suggestions. It will be referred to as PS or Project Skibblez until so. In the event we do get a server name, the thread, and some parts will still be called Project Skibblez because it is a project, but the server overall will be called the new name.

[hr][hr]

[iurl=#con]Content[/iurl]

[iurl=#upd]Updates[/iurl]

[hr][hr]

[anchor=team]The Team:[/anchor]

Currently, I’m the only member of team Skibblez. I have set up some forums for this server using SMF. I’ll be working on getting approval for that shortly. I Sk8rdude461, am the leader, web designer, and project manager of this team. My job is to make the website, keep it healthy, work on the server, edit the server, add content, dispatch updates, etc. Yeah, I do a lot.

Webdesign/Developers:
1.Sk8rdude461

Server Programmers:

  1. Sk8rdude461
  2. (open)

Forum Moderators:
None. This will be based off how many people join and are active on the forums.

Game Moderators:
None. There will be no moderators added in-game until we get to at least the beta phase.

Note: Game/Forum staff will NOT be picked here, there will be no application for it. They will be hand picked by the staff and Administration on Project Skibblez.

[iurl=#nav]Back To Navigation[/iurl]

[hr][hr]

[anchor=med]Media:[/anchor]
Oh, look, character customization.

boHi1.png761×501

Wait, the arrow works right?
Gf1JZ.png769×504

-More to come-

[iurl=#nav]Back To Navigation[/iurl]

[hr][hr]

[anchor=con]Content[/anchor] (Obviously not all of it):
[Red = Unknown/Not started]
[[shadow=black,right]Yellow[/shadow] = Started/Near Done]
[Green = Near Perfect/Completed]

[shadow=black,right]Tutorial island/shadow
[shadow=black,right]All Members Areas blocked[/shadow] (40%)
Melee (80%)
Mage(80%)
Range(80%)
Quests(3%)
Other Content (5-20%)

Blocking members areas is fast and simple, it allows us to focus on making the F2P features as best as possible. Once we get them up to optimal performance, we will work on P2P code.

[iurl=#nav]Back To Navigation[/iurl]

[hr][hr]

[anchor=app]Applications[/anchor] (Thank you Team_Rocket for the new application):

Design Perspicacity:

Experience in Video Game Development:

[iurl=#nav]Back To Navigation[/iurl]

[hr][hr]

[anchor=upd]Updates[/anchor]:

1/08/13: Re-Wrote the Project topic.
1/07/13: Clawz Fury left the development team. Also added 2 pictures, and a new application
12/15-17/12: Wrote more dialogue for tutorial island.
12/15/12: Clawz Fury joins the development team.
12/12/12: Unofficial start of development.

[iurl=#nav]Back To Navigation[/iurl]

[hr][hr]

[anchor=faq]Frequently Asked Questions[/anchor]:
[/center]

  1. You’re making a P2P zone, does that mean players will have to pay to play? No, this server will always be free. Donations, however, will always be accepted; but they will not be pushed upon players. No player will receive some advantage because they did donate. Cosmetics might be handed out though.
  2. Why are the P2P Zones being blocked? So we can concentrate on the free zones, giving you the best content we can, before focusing on the pay to play content.
  3. You have an age requirement, why? It’s there not because I despise young, immature, people. It’s because most people 18 or over have a head on their shoulders, and know more, in general, then someone younger than 18, or 17.
  4. You’re not even 18 yet, why do you have a limit set higher than your age? Well, because I’m close to being 18, so the limit is rather realistic.
  5. Is this going to end up like all the other F2P 06 remakes? No, this server is being made for fun and entertainment, not to profit, or bring content back for nostalgia.
    [center]
    [iurl=#nav]Back To Navigation[/iurl]

Read full topic
